programme.desc: At Animo Venice Charter High School, Ramsay surprises the final five with high school photos of themselves.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants have forty minutes to cook a steak and two sides. The winner dines at Beverly Hills 'CUT'.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: On the USS Iowa, the final two chefs must create three main entrees, one cold appetizer and one hot appetizer.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares

programme.desc: Chef Ramsay helps professional belly dancer-turned-restaurant owner Rishi with her eatery.

programme.desc: The owners of Chappy's, move to Nashville and struggle to find a loyal base of customers.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon visits Harper's Ferry in West Virginia, to try to save a historic hotel that's desperately in need of help. Karan Townsend, the owner, runs the hotel like a thrift store and hoards junk everywhere.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon continues his mission to fix the failing Town's Inn in Harper's Ferry, West Virginia despite having to shut down the hotel after witnessing some shocking food practices. These are some of the worst Ramsay has encountered.

programme.desc: During the challenge, a guest judge cracks down hard on both teams' takes on dessert.

programme.desc: The six remaining chefs will face three challenges to determine which five chefs receive a black jacket.

programme.desc: The finalists compete in the "Taste It Now Make It" challenge, making Chef Ramsay's eggs benedict dish.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The finalists are in a challenge, preparing them for what the Las Vegas Executive Chef position will require.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon tackles stress free cooking. Recipes include sticky pork ribs, a spicy chutney and an amazing chilli chicken with ginger and coriander that just gets better and better with time.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon shows us how to make real fast food. Recipes include his smoky pork sliders with homemade BBQ sauce, chicken stir-fry with rice noodles, and a fast noodle soup with poached egg and spring onions.

programme.desc: Martha and chef Cesare Casella shed light on legumes, exploring the varieties and how to cook them using three different methods: stovetop, oven, and pressure cooker.

programme.desc: Chicken, a mainstay of the dinner table, can be prepared in many ways. Martha prepares chicken paillard, chicken pot pie, and spatchcocked chicken.
